notes.text: Red Hat Build of Apache Camel for Quarkus 3.2.0 is now available (updates to RHBQ 3.2.9.Final).  The purpose of this text-only errata is to inform you about the enhancements that improve your developer  experience and ensure the security and stability of your products
notes.title: Topic

notes.text:
Red Hat Build of Apache Camel for Quarkus 3.2.0 is now available (updates to RHBQ 3.2.9.Final).  The purpose of this text-only errata is to inform you about the enhancements that improve your developer  experience and ensure the security and stability of your products:
  * CVE-2023-39410 avro: apache-avro: Apache Avro Java SDK: Memory when deserializing untrusted data in Avro Java SDK
   * CVE-2023-5072 JSON-java: parser confusion leads to OOM
notes.title: Details

notes.title: Terms of Use

document.title: Red Hat Security Advisory: Red Hat Build of Apache Camel for Quarkus 3.2.0 release (RHBQ 3.2.9.Final)

cwe.name: Allocation of Resources Without Limits or Throttling

notes.text: A flaw was found in the org.json package. A bug in the parser exists, and an input string may lead to undefined usage of memory, leading to an out-of-memory error, causing a denial of service (DoS).
notes.title: Vulnerability description

notes.text: JSON-java: parser confusion leads to OOM
notes.title: Vulnerability summary

notes.text: This vulnerability may cause denial of service with a small string input, causing the server to be unresponsive easily, hence the Important impact.
notes.title: Statement

notes.text: The CVSS score(s) listed for this vulnerability do not reflect the associated product's status, and are included for informational purposes to better understand the severity of this vulnerability.
notes.title: CVSS score applicability

fixed: Red Hat build of Apache Camel for Quarkus

remediations.details:
Before applying this update, make sure all previously released errata
relevant to your system have been applied.

For details on how to apply this update, refer to:

https://access.redhat.com/articles/11258
product_ids: Red Hat build of Apache Camel for Quarkus

remediations.details: No current mitigation is available for this flaw.
product_ids: Red Hat build of Apache Camel for Quarkus

products: Red Hat build of Apache Camel for Quarkus

vulnerabilities.title: JSON-java: parser confusion leads to OOM

notes.text: A flaw was found in apache-avro. When deserializing untrusted or corrupted data, it is possible for a reader to consume memory beyond the allowed constraints, leading to an out-of-memory error and a denial of service on the system.
notes.title: Vulnerability description

notes.text: apache-avro: Apache Avro Java SDK: Memory when deserializing untrusted data in Avro Java SDK
notes.title: Vulnerability summary

notes.text: The CVSS score(s) listed for this vulnerability do not reflect the associated product's status, and are included for informational purposes to better understand the severity of this vulnerability.
